creditline: Gift of the collection of Mari and Irving Lipton
description: cylindrical shaped vessel; convex cover with elaborate finial with point on an orb with zigzag horizontal opening at center, with pink wood at interior; vertical wave designs on body; greenish-tan body; dark brown cover
inscription:

on bottom, incised: [(obscured by sticker) wood / Blackwood / & / Pinkwood]
title: Ornamental Box Form
